data.title: How to make a feelgood movie – Lukas Moodysson interview – We are the best! – Time Out Film
data.meta_description: Find out how to make a feelgood movie with this guide, in which ‘We Are the Best!’ director Lukas Moodysson reveals his formula for warm, fuzzy filmmaking.
data.text: Moodysson’s sense of place, period and character is incredibly surefooted, and there’s boundless joy to be found in watching Bobo and Klara make their thunderously confident first steps towards punk superstardom. It’s hardly original material – much of the humour relies on our familiarity with high-school movie clichés – but the brisk script and effortless performances lend freshness.
